content.raw: yes, because of that I think the update can be called only in the parse method, we will have a container of Agent with socketID that will be used in update method in order to indicate the effectors of which agent should be updated. The main plugin is the same only it does not have effector->update() line, I will commit the new version of update method as soon as possible, and please check that if we still have this problem.
content.html: yes, because of that I think the update can be called only in the parse method, we will have a container of Agent with socketID that will be used in update method in order to indicate the effectors of which agent should be updated. The main plugin is the same only it does not have effector->update() line, I will commit the new version of update method as soon as possible, and please check that if we still have this problem.
